import React from 'react' import noteContext from "../context/notes/notesContext"; const AddNote = () => { const context = useContext(noteContext); const {addNote} = context; const [note, setnote] = useState({title:"",description:"",tag:""}) const handleClick = () =>{ } const handleChange = (e)=>{ setnote({...note,[e.target.name] : e.target.value}) } return (
